body_html: @markvdw I think it would be useful if such code were in tensorflow; various projects, especially ones that do Gaussian process inference, really need to work with vectors of triangular matrices, e.g. GPflow and AutoGP
body_text: @markvdw I think it would be useful if such code were in tensorflow; various projects, especially ones that do Gaussian process inference, really need to work with vectors of triangular matrices, e.g. GPflow and AutoGP
body: @markvdw I think it would be useful if such code were in tensorflow; various projects, especially ones that do Gaussian process inference, really need to work with vectors of triangular matrices, e.g. [GPflow](https://github.com/GPflow/GPflow/blob/master/gpflow/tf_wraps.py) and [AutoGP](https://github.com/ebonilla/AutoGP/blob/master/autogp/util/tf_ops/tri_to_vec.cc)
